name: Zoey Makes Cookies
description:
Lead your restaurant as the head cat chef, experiment with new recipes and satisfy your customers.

Supports up to 3 paws on a single keyboard. (You might want to have an Anti-Ghosting keyboard)

Note: There is currently no losing conditions, except the bitterness of not serving your customers in time.

(Fullscreen required with at least 1600x900) (Escape to close Fullscreen)
